body:
Comment 1: 
I can recreate this.  There seems to be something wrong with the new code in traceback
that is tracking panics.

--- FAIL: TestPanicOne (0.00 seconds)
	foo_test.go:11: test failed with panic: boo!
fatal error: unexpected signal during runtime execution
[signal 0xb code=0x1 addr=0xc300000007 pc=0x41a521]

runtime stack:

runtime.sigpanic()
	/home/iant/go/src/pkg/runtime/os_linux.c:222 +0x3d fp=0x7f6f3800bbe0 sp=0x7f6f3800bbc8

0x4083c0, 0x7f6f3800bdc8, 0x0)

addstackroots(0xc2080027e0, 0x7f6f3800bdc8)

gc(0x7f6f3800de08)
